snippet: Retail sales rose 0.2 percent in June but core retail sales increased 0.6 percent in June after rising an upwardly revised 0.2 percent in May, the Commerce Department reported.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports that retail sales rose 0.2 percent in June, held back by drop in auto sales, after upwardly revised gain of 0.5 percent in May; core retail sales increase 0.6 percent in June, latest indication that economy has ended second quarter on stronger footing.
lead_paragraph: Retail sales rose 0.2 percent in June but core retail sales increased 0.6 percent in June after rising an upwardly revised 0.2 percent in May, the Commerce Department reported.
